alert.note: Alert for Kern River Valley; Piute Walker Basin (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 25 at 3:45PM PST until March 01 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON BELOW 8000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 27 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Kern River Valley and Piute Walker Basin. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 4 PM PST this afternoon. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Sunday night through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Kern River Valley; Piute Walker Basin
